entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature falling to minus 1 this morning then steady.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this morning then light this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 1 this morning then steady. Wind chill near minus 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening. Snow beginning before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 3 this evening and minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Monday 30 January 2023
